name: 汪昆立
objective: 本課程之內容包括：化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論，動力學數據之處理，各式理想反應器之設計，反應器的選擇原則和原理，非理想狀態反應器之討論，單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論只給予基本的認識介紹.
schedule:
1. Overview of chemical reaction engineering (Chapter 1, 1st week)
2. Kinetics of homogeneous reactions (Chapter 2, 2nd-3rd weeks)
3. Interpretation of batch reactor data (Chapter 3, 4th-5th weeks)
4. Introduction to reactor design (Chapter 4, 6th week)
5. Middle examination (7th week)
6. Ideal reactors for a single reaction (Chapter 5, 8th-9th weeks)
7. Design for single reactions (Chapter 6, 10th-11th weeks)
8. Design for Parallel reactions (Chapter 7, 12th week)
9. Potpourri of multiple reactions (Chapter 8, 13th week)
10. Temperature and Pressure Effects (Chapter 9, 14th week)
11. Choosing the right kind of reactor (Chapter 10, 15th week)
12. Basic concepts of non-idea flow (Part II and Part III, 16th-17th weeks)
13. Final examination (18th week)
scorePolicy:
Middle Examination 35 pts
Final Examination 35 pts
Usual Appearance (including ZUVIO test) 30 pts+.
There will be a severe penalty for being late or not attending the class. The maximum penalty will flunk at the end of the semester.
